title: enna kuraiyum
sahitya:
enna kuraiyum vaikkavillaiyE ennammai suvarNAngi mahAlakSmiyE


anupallavi

  anna vicAram inri shonna vicAram inri Atma vicAram sheyyum Anandam tanda pin


caraNam    shEi pOlavE mAdaik-tAyAgavE kaNDEn jIva kOTigaLilE shivamayam viNDEn
tUya vAzhvuDan bhuvit-toNDinaik-kaikkoNDEn tUNDu shuDar pOl vAzha vENDum enrenai ANDAL
